thread.title: Clean Rooms - Quiet hotel
thread.title_full: Clean Rooms - Quiet hotel - Review of Color Design Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cemac_first
title: Clean Rooms - Quiet hotel
text:
I come back to this hotel when I'm in the area.
Quiet place. Rooms are good.
I would say not enough hangers to put your clothes on... Still no fridges in the room.
The procedure to guaranty your booking does not really work.
I booked by phone, when I arrive a few hours later my booking was not in the system...
Hopefully there were some rooms still available.
They need to improve their booking procedure.
